scripts.publish:patch: cd projects/mp-toolkit && npm version patch && git push && cd.. && cd.. && npm publish
scripts.publish:minor: cd projects/mp-toolkit && npm version minor && git push && npm publish
scripts.publish:major: cd projects/mp-toolkit && npm version major && git push && npm publish
scripts.build-publish-minor: npm run build:lib && npm run publish:minor
scripts.build-publish-patch: npm run build:lib && npm run publish:patch
scripts.build-publish-major: npm run build:lib && npm run publish:major
scripts.publish-patch: npm version patch && git push && npm publish
scripts.publish-minor: npm version minor && git push && npm publish
scripts.publish-major: npm version major && git push && npm publish
